title: Update roster
text: The casual employees studying at university are currently on holidays. They should be given more hours next week.

title: Stock order
text: Show the new floor manager how to do the weekly order!

title: Banking
text: Go to the bank earlier to avoid the lunchtime queue…

title: Staff induction
text: Have all the paperwork ready… and your script… for the new team member induction.

title: Chamber of Commerce dinner
text: Don't forget to change out of your work clothes and get into your dinner suit after work!
